title: [Proposal] Treatment of Unswapped Tokens
body:
# Governance proposal #3 - Treatment of Unswapped Tokens


![]("https://i.imgur.com/zrJaZWR.jpg")
  
### Background:

Since we announced our token swap last year, now we’ve completed the migration of over *78.81%* (+6.8% from the last proposal) of the network according to Etherscan, and special thanks to our community, and partners who helped us accomplish this.


As the community had concluded on [ [Proposal #2](https://governance.dawn.org/#/dawn/proposal/QmcSEA18XeDk9a8sBUq1NKKQzEjSjUhqW1Sg14BENB3vz6) ], we would like to introduce a new proposal for network participants to decide on what to do with the unswapped tokens.

  
### Purpose:


Due to overwhelming feedback from active network participants (current Dawn holders), we are initiating this proposal with the intention of figuring out the best way to move forward with the unswapped tokens since these tokens will eventually be locked in the contract.  Hopefully, by the end of this proposal, we will be able to move forward with a plan that’s most advantageous to the entire community.

  
### Proposals:


***Selecting a proposed plan -***


You need to choose a plan for how the unswapped tokens would be treated:

 

 - [ ] **Option #1:** Burn the entirety of unswapped tokens to reduce redundant network supply as soon as token swap concludes. We will send the unswapped tokens, on a schedule, to a one-directional address and provide proof to the community.  

 - [ ] **Option #2:** Do nothing with unswapped tokens  
 
 - [ ] **Option #3:** Contribute unswapped tokens to a DAO which can be used as incentives for community engagement, development, and marketing growth.  All token holders can submit and vote on proposals on how the DAO allocates its budget.  
  
 - [ ] **Option #4:** Contribute unswapped tokens to a liquidity mining pool (Dawn LMP) which can be used as incentives for holders to stake and provide decentralized liquidity. The incentives will be distributed on an adjusted APY% based on the amount of LP participation.

  
  
### To Participate:  
 
You need to withdraw your tokens from a cryptocurrency exchange to an Ethereum wallet that supports DeFi, like MetaMask, or to a hardware wallet like Trezor

You need to have tokens in your wallet before ***April 26th, 2021***

The voting window is from ***April 27th, 2021 to May 11th, 2021***

Voting itself is not going to cost anything

Read the voting instructions here

([https://dawn.org/post/how-to-vote-on-dawn-token-governance](https://dawn.org/post/how-to-vote-on-dawn-token-governance))

  
  
  ----------------
  



## 社区自治提议3# - 如何处理未完成转换的1ST

  

### 背景：

  

自2020年中开始进行1ST转换为Dawn的工作以来，据Etherscan上的数据表明，截至目前已有78.71%的1ST完成了转换（在1月28日时为71.99%）。在此再次衷心感谢社区成员和相关机构的协同合作。目前，【转换截止日期】的投票正在进行中，请参见https://snapshot.org/#/dawn/proposal/QmcSEA18XeDk9a8sBUq1NKKQzEjSjUhqW1Sg14BENB3vz6 。同时我们决定很快进行【如何处理未完成转换的1ST】的社区投票工作。

  

### 目的:

由于不断收到大量的持有Dawn的用户反馈，此提案的目的是找到对未完成转换的1ST的最佳处理方式，1ST最终将被锁定在合同中。在本提案结束时，我们希望可以制定出有利于整个社区的计划。

  

### 提议：

  

**选择你希望如何处理未转换的1ST：**

  

 - [ ] 提议 #1：在转换截止日期到期之时，立即销毁所有未完成转换的1ST已减少流通量. 开发团队会定期将销毁的数据公开。
       
         
     
  - [ ]  提议 #2：对所有未完成转换的1ST不做任何处理
       
         
       
  - [ ]  提议 #3：将所有未完成转换的1ST贡献给DAO（开源区块协议）, DAO可以用来激励社区参与、开发和运营促增长。
       
        
       
   - [ ] 提议 #4：将所有未完成转换的1ST用于流动矿池 (Dawn
       LMP)，用于激励用户锁仓并提供去中心化的流动性。奖励将根据调整后的有限合伙人参与金额的年收益率（APY%）进行分配。

  

### 参与方式：

 

-   参与者需要将Dawn存入支持DeFi的以太钱包，例如MetaMask，或硬件钱包，例如Trezor
    
-   Dawn必须在 **4月26日, 2021** 之前存入钱包
    
-   投票日期 **4月27日, 2021 至 5月11日, 2021**
    
-   投票本身不产生费用
    
-   如何操作请参见：https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404598240309018864
author: 0xAFeBdE56612590cBB17a0f1E07699040E8C470ab
